CommandDefinition.Name: removeobjectfromapplication
CommandDefinition.Description: Removes an object and optionally all dependencies from an application.

Argument.Name: objectName
Argument.Description: The name of the object to be removed from the application.

Argument.Name: type
Argument.Description: Without this parameter, the objectName is the fully qualified path to a MDM object (Workflow, Datatype, Service, Exception). Otherwise the objectName represents the object specified by the type. Possible values for type are 'trigger', 'triggerInstanceName', 'filter', 'filterInstanceName', 'xynaProperty', 'orderType', 'capacityName', 'formdefinition' and 'orderInputSource'.

BoolOption.Name: f
BoolOption.Description: Deprecated: The object will be removed even if it is still in use by some other objects. These will be removed as well.

BoolOption.Name: d
BoolOption.Description: Deprecated: Also removes objects used by the removed object if otherwise unused.

Argument.Name: parentWorkspace
Argument.Description: The name of the parent workspace.
